# compatible

**Type Property**

An encoding policy that chooses the most compatible encoding even if transcoding is necessary.

## Declaration

```swift
static let compatible: PhotosPickerItem.EncodingDisambiguationPolicy
```

## Getting standard encoding policies

- **automatic**: An encoding policy that chooses the best encoding.
- **current**: An encoding policy that chooses the current encoding to avoid transcoding, if possible.

items.description: An encoding policy that chooses the best encoding.
